knowledge_transfers: Enhanced unified GitHub tool provides 2x API capacity (REST 5,000/hr + GraphQL 5,000/hr = 10,000/hr effectively)

lessons_learned: Multiple GitHub accounts technically possible but not best practice - GitHub Apps preferred
REST API has separate rate limits from GraphQL - effectively doubles capacity when using both
Queue system prevents operation loss - all rate-limited operations preserved for retry
Auto-switching maximizes API usage - always uses best available API
Draft PR transitions require GitHub UI - API limitation cannot be bypassed
Workspace validation must be enforced at creation time - prevents invalid directory proliferation
